    • searchComment

      public List<com.enttribe.orchestrator.utility.model.Comment> searchComment(String query, Integer lowerLimit, Integer upperLimit, String orderBy, String orderType)
      Description copied from interface: CommentIntegrationService
      Searches for comments based on the provided query and other optional parameters.
      Specified by:
      searchComment in interface CommentIntegrationService
      Parameters:
      query - The search query used to filter comments.
      lowerLimit - The lower limit of the result set for pagination.
      upperLimit - The upper limit of the result set for pagination.
      orderBy - The field used for sorting the results.
      orderType - The order type (e.g., "asc" for ascending, "desc" for descending).
      Returns:
      A list of Comment objects representing the search results.
